page.title: 03EDUCATION:SCHOOLS
page.content: There are{two schools}in Potton: {Potton Lower School}and{Burgoyne {Middle School.}They are adjacent to each other. Potton Lower School is quite a{large modern building}with a large playing field and two playgrounds. At present there are{two {hundred and forty seven pupils,}seven teachers, one deputy head and one head. There are eight classes.{The {school uniform is blue.}Burgoyne Middle School is named after the Burgoyne family who lived in the eighteenth century. The school was founded in 1976 as a purpose built middle school designed to accomodate {six hundred pupils aged 9-13.}The school uniform is predominantly{red. {Most of the pupils at Burgoyne school come from{Potton. Many of the children {involved with this project will start {at Burgoyne in September 1985.
